price: Rabbii waliin gooftaa biraa hin kadhatin, [Yoo akkas goote] warra adabaman irraa taata.
arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatakūna mina al-muʿadhabīna
